main.name: Sameer Randive
main.shortDesc: I focus on developing user-friendly web applications that meet the client's requirements, with attention to detail, scalability, and performance.

about.title: Full Stack Developer
about.about: I am a Full-Stack developer based in Nagpur, India. I'm an Information Technology undergraduate from SPPU, and my journey in web development began during my first year of college. I'm passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-friendly websites and applications, and I'm constantly pushing myself to learn and grow as a developer. Love building full-stack clones and side projects.

projects.name: Hammer Headphones Website
projects.techstack: React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Firebase

projects.name: Investment Tracker
projects.techstack: React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS

projects.name: Promptopia
projects.techstack: React, Firebase ,Tailwind CSS ,Cloudinary, Redux, AI Integration
projects.description: Create and share amazing prompts with the world, and let your imagination run wild with any AI-powered platform.

desc: Completed Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) with a strong foundation in programming, software engineering, and database management.
Built academic projects using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, and MySQL, focusing on responsive design and backend integration.
Explored enterprise-level backend development using Java and Spring Boot, implementing RESTful APIs and connecting to relational databases.
Gained hands-on experience with version control (Git), debugging tools, and collaborative development workflows.

educations.institute: G H Raisoni College of Engineering and Management
desc: Completed a Master's in Computer Applications (MCA) with a focus on Information Technology.
Gained hands-on experience in full-stack web development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SQL.
Designed and implemented database systems, and built dynamic web applications as part of academic projects.
Well-versed in software development methodologies including Agile and Waterfall, with exposure to collaborative project planning and execution.
Assisted in handling medical billing and insurance claim submissions.
Supported follow-up on outstanding accounts to ensure timely collections.
Learned and applied Accounts Receivable processes including payment posting and account reconciliation.
Worked with the team to resolve claim denials and discrepancies.
Skills: Accounts Receivable · Medical Billing · Insurance Claims · Account Reconciliation · Communication · MS Excel
Contributed to full-stack development across multiple client projects, focusing on both frontend and backend implementation.
Built responsive user interfaces using HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, Bootstrap, and React.js.
Developed backend modules using PHP and Spring Boot, integrating MySQL databases for dynamic data handling.
Collaborated with senior developers to debug, optimize, and deploy scalable web applications.
